name: TG Rename Bot
description: Telegram's best Open Source Rename Bot. Create your Fork now.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

CHAT_BASE_TOKEN.description: Your chat base token, as a string.

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot

CHUNK_SIZE.description: chunk size that should be used with requests

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: given app name to the heroku app

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: get a Heroku API key from http://dashboard.heroku.com/account
